remarks: Identity law for points on lines.  Theorem 4.18 of [Schwabhauser] p. 38.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Apr-2019.)
statement:
tglngval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglngval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglngval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglngval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglngval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
tglngval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
tgcolg.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) $.
lnxfr.r $e |- .~ = ( cgrG ` G ) $.
lnxfr.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
lnxfr.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
lnxfr.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
lnid.1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= Y ) $.
lnid.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( Y e. ( X L Z ) \/ X = Z ) ) $.
lnid.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( X .- Z ) = ( X .- A ) ) $.
lnid.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( Y .- Z ) = ( Y .- A ) ) $.
lnid $p |- ( ph -> Z = A ) $.
